content: Hello Satish! It's nice to meet you. How can I assist you today?
Can I know what is the day today
does year 2025 is a leap year
Yes, 2025 is not a leap year.
2025 is not a leap year because it is not divisible by 4. Leap years occur every 4 years, and 2025 does not meet this criteria.
Can I know where is the champions trophy 2025 held
The ICC Champions Trophy 2025 is scheduled to be held in Pakistan.
I'm not aware of any specific match scheduled for today, March 4, 2025. If you're looking for information about a particular tournament or league, please let me know and I'll do my best to help!
I don't have real-time information about the Champions Trophy 2025 semi-final match, as it has not been scheduled or played yet.
The teams in Group A of the ICC Champions Trophy 2025 are Pakistan, India, Australia, and New Zealand.
Goodbye Satish! It was nice chatting with you.

CLS can refer to several things. Based on the search results, CLS can be:

1. CLS Group, a specialized financial market infrastructure group whose main entity is the New York-based CLS Bank.
2. Cumulative Layout Shift (CLS), a measure of the largest burst of layout shift scores for every unexpected layout shift that occurs during the entire lifecycle of a page.
3. CLS Private Limited, a company established in July 2019 to provide specialized analytical and research services for pharma and related products.

Which CLS are you referring to?
